name: John Deighton

roles_in_work.title: An Interview with Brigadier John P.A. Deighton

biography: Brigadier John P.A. Deighton was 18 when he joined the army. He served for a total of 30 years, 25 of which he was commanding soldiers. He fought in Vietnam and Malaya and recieved a Military Cross in 1968. He was later CEO for the RSL (Victorian branch) for 17 years.
